title: Driver (1999 Game).zip
description:
Driver {Complete Version} ncd disc image
 
Compatible burning software
PowerIso , ISObuster , UltraIso , NTI CD Maker
and probably others as well...

The criminal underworld has accepted you as one of their own. You are a getaway driver for hire. Speeding through the streets of real cities with working traffic systems, pedestrians and motorists on the street and cops on patrol. You are the best Driver in the entire criminal community. You are the wheelman. 


Game Features: 
Real cities - Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco and Miami - All with recognizable landmarks and working traffic systems. 
Over 40 missions of high speed action featuring amazing true to life driving physics and crashes! 
Film your own 70's style high speed car chases using the revolutionary Director mode. 
Unfolding story line of corruption and double cross. 

System Requirements:
200MHz Pentium (266MHz recommended)
Windows 95
32MB RAM (64MB recommended)
Direct 3D compatible video card (2MB video display memory) or glide compatible graphics card 
(4MB video display memory recommended)
4x speed CD ROM drive
167MB hard drive space
3D accelerator required
